column5: Imagine a place where you can wake up to a beautiful sunrise every morning from the comfort of your Master Bedroom. Our condo is full facing beachfront and is on the 4th Floor. It has unparalleled expansive views of the beach and ocean from the Master Bedroom, Living Room, Kitchen and Balcony. Our views are unobstructed through 8-foot floor to ceiling glass. It does not get any better than this!!!
